## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Zm00001eb153000](https://www.maizegdb.org/gene_center/gene/Zm00001eb153000)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ZmCCD8</u>
- **Gene Name:** CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8
- **Genome:** [Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.0](https://www.maizegdb.org/genome/assembly/Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.0)
- **Species:** *Zea mays*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - Comparative genome analysis revealed that maize depends on a single **CCD8** gene (Zm**CCD8**), unlike other panicoid grasses that have multiple **CCD8** paralogs.
   - Function of **ZmCCD8** was confirmed by transgenic complementation of Arabidopsis (Arabidopsis thaliana) max4 (**CCD8**) and by phenotypic rescue of the maize mutant (**zmCCD8**::Ds) using a synthetic SL (GR24).
   - **ZmCCD8** Expression in Reproductive Organs and Vegetative tissues.
   - Feedback Regulation of **ZmCCD8** by SL Signaling.
   - Short Stature, Inflorescence Size, and Narrow-Stalk Phenotypes of the **zmCCD8** Mutant.
   - The Small Root Architecture Phenotype of the **zmCCD8** Mutant.
